about_the_game:
☆About the Story★

A childhood accident had paralyzed both Viola's left leg and her later life. Bullying. Loneliness. Departure. Discrimination. For someone as innocent as Viola, who still does not understand how to face the darkness, escaping and isolating seems to be the only redemption.

Until one day, a mysterious girl appears in her dream.

☆About the Game★

JRPG-style side scroller, story-rich. Explore the world by interacting with the environments and the characters.
Approximate play time：3-5 hours.

Consists of two endings: TE1 and TE2. (Two True Endings)

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a minor degree of psychological horror, abusive language, and suicidal attempts triggered by traumatic experiences.

short_description: "Margaritari", a JRPG-style narrative game. Consisting of 9 chapters, the story begins with the encounter of two 17-year-old girls. Help the protagonist discover the secret of humanity and love, and that will be the redemption for both herself and her love.
